treatment-md.title: Rossjoycea glacialis Liebherr, 2011, gen. n. and sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Cladistic assessment of subtribal affinities within the tribe Moriomorphini with description of Rossjoycea glacialis, gen. n. and sp. n. from the South Island, and revision of Meonochilus Liebherr and Marris from the North Island, New Zealand (Coleoptera, Carabidae)
